SEARCH
Module com.example.fitnesschaingui
Package com.example.fitnesschaingui

Class GymManagerController

java.lang.Object
com.example.fitnesschaingui.GymManagerController
public class GymManagerController extends Object
Controller for the Gym Manager GUI. Handles user inputs to manage the member database and fitness classes. Handles onClick functionality for GUI Nodes.

  • Constructor Details

    • GymManagerController

      public GymManagerController()
      Constructs GymManagerController object. Creates new member database and fitness class objects.

  • Method Details

    • onAddButtonClick

      protected void onAddButtonClick()
      Facilitates method to add a new member. Performs input validation and handles output to user. Ensures that all locations, dates, and names are valid from GUI input fields.

    • onRemoveButtonClick

      protected void onRemoveButtonClick()
      Facilitates method to remove an existing member. Prints appropriate user message regarding whether the member was removed or not. If the member wasn't removed, it is because they didn't exist in the database.

    • memberValidate

      protected boolean memberValidate()
      Validates members inputted in the Membership tab. Checks if the member has a valid name and date.
      Returns:
      true if member is valid, false otherwise.

    • classValidate

      protected boolean classValidate()
      Validates class inputs in the Fitness Class tab. Checks if the inputs are existing and valid.
      Returns:
      true if inputs are valid, false otherwise.

    • onCheckInClick

      protected void onCheckInClick()
      Facilitates method to check an existing member into a fitness class. Performs input validation and handles output to user. Ensures that all classes, names, and dates are valid.

    • onDoneClick

      protected void onDoneClick()
      Facilitates method to check out an existing member from a fitness class. Performs input validation and handles output to user. Ensures that all classes, names, and dates are valid.

    • onPrintClick

      protected void onPrintClick()
      Prints current member list.

    • onPrintByCountyClick

      protected void onPrintByCountyClick()
      Prints member list sorted by county and leaves databases sorted.

    • onPrintByNameClick

      protected void onPrintByNameClick()
      Prints member list sorted by last, then first name and leaves databases sorted.

    • onPrintByExpirationClick

      protected void onPrintByExpirationClick()
      Prints member list sorted by expiration date and leaves databases sorted.

    • onLoadMembersClick

      protected void onLoadMembersClick()
      Loads and prints the loaded members from the file. Calls the loadMembers() function of the MemberDatabase class. Prints appropriate output headers for the list of members.

    • onPrintClassesClick

      protected void onPrintClassesClick()
      Prints class schedule.

    • onLoadClassesClick

      protected void onLoadClassesClick()
      Loads and prints the loaded schedule from the file. Calls the loadSchedule() function of the ClassSchedule class. Prints appropriate output headers for the list of classes.

    • onFirstBillClick

      protected void onFirstBillClick()
      Prints the member database with fees (including starting fees).

    • onNextBillClick

      protected void onNextBillClick()
      Prints the member database with just recurring fees.
